|V.35/E1 Converter|H0FL-0135|transports V.35 data via E1 network. It's widely used for routerinter connection and DDN accessing as well as remote LAN connection. It can provide best solution with simplicity
column2: efficiency cost-effectiveness and high reliability for data communication platform.|
Convert unframed or framed V.35 to E1 interface
Comply with ITU-T G.703  Bit rate: 2048kbit/s ±50ppm  Code: HDB3  Input impedance: 75Ω and 120Ω
Comply with ITU-T V.35/V.36  Interface speed: N×64kbit/s, 1≤N≤31; unframed : 2048kbit/s  Work mode: DCE, DTE optional
AC or DC optional  DC -48V  （  -38V ~ -72V  ）  AC  ～  220V  （  100V ~ 260V  ）
